message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. After careful consideration, we believe it would be beneficial for both of us if you were to acquire this item at a special introductory price of $14500. This is a limited-time offer, so please let me know if you're interested.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13000. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I understand your perspective and appreciate your offer. Considering the value of the product and our business goals, I propose we move forward with an offer of $13750 for the product. This is a fair compromise that respects both our positions.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I'm still a bit hesitant, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I propose an offer of $13250 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value of the product and our negotiations so far.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Bob. To further explore a mutually beneficial agreement, I propose an offer of $13500 for the product. This reflects a compromise while also considering the value we place on the transaction.

I understand your position, Alice, and I appreciate the effort to find a mutually beneficial agreement. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I propose an offer of $13000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your final offer, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your efforts. To reach a conclusion, I am willing to consider an offer of $13375 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise that respects both our interests.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I propose an offer of $12900 for the product. This is my last offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your last offer, Bob. I appreciate your persistence and understanding. In light of our ongoing discussions, I am willing to consider an offer of $13100 for the product. This represents a fair compromise between our respective positions.

Alice, I understand that we're getting close, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer. I propose an offer of $12800 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
